scripts.dev: yarn genCert && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEFAULT_LAUNCH_DARKLY_FLAG=false nodemon app/server.ts
scripts.dev:aat: yarn genCert && cross-env $(cat aat.env | xargs) NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=aatDevelopment NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider nodemon app/server.ts
scripts.test:unit: rm -rf test/coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DEFAULT_LAUNCH_DARKLY_FLAG=false nyc mocha --require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require test/unit/setup.ts --recursive "test/unit/**/*.test.ts" --reporter mochawesome --exit
scripts.test:unit-file: rm -rf test/coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DEFAULT_LAUNCH_DARKLY_FLAG=false nyc mocha --exit
scripts.test:a11y: echo 'Accessibility check runs in functional tests'
scripts.test:smoke: yarn install:browser; NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 IDAM_API_URL=https://idam-api.aat.platform.hmcts.net codeceptjs run -c codecept.smoke.ts --grep @smoke --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test:all: yarn lint && yarn test && yarn test:a11y && yarn test:smoke && yarn test:functional && yarn test:e2e
scripts.test:crossbrowser: yarn install:browser; cross-env NODE_ENV=ci IDAM_API_URL=https://idam-api.aat.platform.hmcts.net codeceptjs run-multiple -c codecept.crossbrowser.js -g @crossbrowser --all --steps
scripts.codecept:functional: yarn install:browser; TEST_URL=https://localhost:3000 USE_REDIS=false IDAM_WEB_URL=http://localhost:20001 IDAM_API_URL=http://localhost:20001 CCD_API_URL=http://localhost:20000 ADDRESS_LOOKUP_URL=http://localhost:20002 DOC_MANAGEMENT_URL=http://localhost:20003 CASE_DOCUMENT_AM_URL=http://localhost:20003 S2S_URL=http://localhost:20004 PCQ_URL=http://localhost:20005 cross-env NODE_ENV=test DEFAULT_LAUNCH_DARKLY_FLAG=true codeceptjs run-workers 3 -c codecept.functional.ts --verbose -g '(?=.*)^(?!.*@disabled)'
scripts.codecept:functional-wip: yarn install:browser; cross-env NODE_ENV=test DEFAULT_LAUNCH_DARKLY_FLAG=true codeceptjs run -c codecept.functional.ts --verbose -g '(?=.*)^(?!.*@disabled)'
scripts.codecept:e2e: yarn install:browser; NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 IDAM_API_URL=https://idam-api.aat.platform.hmcts.net codeceptjs run-workers 3 -c codecept.e2e.ts
scripts.codecept:e2e-local: yarn install:browser; IDAM_API_URL=http://localhost:5000 codeceptjs run -c codecept.e2e.ts --verbose --debug
scripts.setupUser: yarn install:browser; cross-env NODE_ENV=e2e-local codeceptjs run -c codecept.setup.js --verbose --debug | grep ia_citizen
scripts.createCase-aat: zsh ./scripts/get-create-case-variables.sh aat && cross-env $(cat createCase.env | xargs) node --require ts-node/register/transpile-only test/e2e-test/service/create-case-in-state.ts
scripts.createCase-frontend-pr: zsh ./scripts/get-create-case-variables.sh pr-aip $PR_NUMBER && cross-env $(cat createCase.env | xargs) node --require ts-node/register/transpile-only test/e2e-test/service/create-case-in-state.ts
scripts.createCase-case-api-pr: zsh ./scripts/get-create-case-variables.sh pr-case-api $PR_NUMBER && cross-env $(cat createCase.env | xargs) node --require ts-node/register/transpile-only test/e2e-test/service/create-case-in-state.ts
scripts.genCert: mkdir -p keys && openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout keys/server.key -out keys/server.cert -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -subj "/C=XX/ST=StateName/L=CityName/O=CompanyName/OU=CompanySectionName/CN=CommonNameOrHostname"
